reviewtext: Packaging is a little excessive but it does give the headphones a luxury feel. The headphones themselves are very comfortable even with the pleather. They're actually really compact compared to many cans at this price. Lows, mids and highs are all excellent for under $100. The build quality is nothing less than superb as expected, doesn't feel plasticy or vulnerable to breakage at all. Need time to break in these new cans but I can say that these are similar to the HD280s but the Sony's are more comfortable and less costly. I recommend these to anyone looking for affordable headphones for music or monitoring in general.
